exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="AppSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="gameLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="debugLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Scroller left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
			<e:Group>
				<e:Label id="debugLabel" x="196" y="208" width="960" textColor="0xFF0000"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameLayerSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="m_backgroundNode" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="m_farGround" width="960" x="0" height="640" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="m_midGround" width="960" x="0" height="640" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="m_nearGround" width="960" x="0" height="640" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="m_objGround" width="960" x="0" height="640" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="m_cloudGround" width="960" x="0" height="640" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="m_foregroundNode" x="0" y="0" width="960" height="640"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect right="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.38" top="0" bottom="0" y="20" x="20"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-result_png" y="79" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-top_png" y="25" width="637" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-result-item_png" x="176" y="273"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-result-item_png" x="176" y="337"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-result-item_png" x="176" y="402"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-bottom_png" y="457" width="629" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-common-btn_png" y="523" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image id="btnRetry" source="btn-common_png" y="532" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image source="icon-resume_png" x="409" y="542" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image source="label-back_png" x="466" y="550" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-highest-score_png" x="506" y="232"/>
	<e:Image source="icon-result-bird_png" x="186" y="280"/>
	<e:Image source="icon-result-item1_png" x="186" y="347"/>
	<e:Image source="icon-fruit-result_png" x="186" y="412"/>
	<e:Image source="label-result_png" y="32" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelFruit" y="415" text="0" x="354" font="num_fruit" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelRecord" y="237" text="0" x="626" font="num_dis"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelCat" y="350" text="0" x="354" font="num_dis"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDis" y="286" text="0" x="354" font="num_dis"/>
	<e:Group height="108" width="347" x="195" y="142">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="labelScore" y="58" font="num_score" text="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="label-toltal-score_png" y="15" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HelpLayerSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect right="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.38" top="0" x="10" y="10"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-common1_png" x="146" y="152" width="694" height="370"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_close" source="btn-close-touched1_png" x="770" y="146"/>
	<e:Label text="深圳动游科技" y="306" textColor="0x81681D" size="44" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="46"/>
	<e:Label text="深圳风精灵科技" y="419" size="33" bold="true" horizontalCenter="1" anchorOffsetY="0" height="38" textColor="0x0a0a09"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StaminaBaSkin" width="216" height="58" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="staLeftCornetBg" source="sta_l_corner_bg_png" verticalCenter="0" width="27" height="58"/>
	<e:Image id="staLeftCornerIn" source="sta_l_corner_in_png" verticalCenter="0" width="19" height="40"/>
	<e:Image id="m_staMiddleBg" source="sta_middle_bg_png" x="21" verticalCenter="0" width="20" height="58" scaleX="1"/>
	<e:Image id="m_staMiddleIn" source="sta_middle_in_png" x="95" verticalCenter="0" width="20" height="40" scaleX="1"/>
	<e:Image id="m_staRightCornetIn" source="sta_r_corner_in_png" x="186" verticalCenter="0" width="19" height="40"/>
	<e:Image id="m_staRightCornetBg" source="sta_r_corner_bg_png" verticalCenter="0" x="189" width="27" height="58"/>
	<e:Image id="staLeftCornet" source="sta_l_corner_png" verticalCenter="0" width="19" height="40"/>
	<e:Image id="m_staRightCornet" source="sta_r_corner_png" x="189.5" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="m_staMiddle" source="sta_middle_png" x="36" verticalCenter="0" width="20" height="40"/>


	<e:Image source="sta_fly_icon_png" x="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HudLayerSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="m_distanceLabel" x="13" y="83" text="0" font="num_dis"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="m_fruitNumLabel" x="69" y="141" text="0" font="num_fruit"/>
		<ns1:StaminaBarNode id="m_staminaBar" x="13" y="13" skinName="StaminaBaSkin" width="216" height="58"/>
		<e:Image source="icon-fruit-score_png" x="13" y="138"/>
		<e:Group id="warningLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
			<e:Image source="warning_bar_png" right="0" y="640" left="0" scaleY="-1"/>
			<e:Image source="warning_bar_png" y="0" left="0" right="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="176" width="852" y="434" horizontalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false">
			<e:Image id="btn_jump" source="btn-control_png" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
			<e:Image id="btn_dash" source="btn-control_png" verticalCenter="0" right="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
			<e:Label text="跳跃" x="25" touchEnabled="false" bold="true" size="64" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label text="冲撞" x="699" touchEnabled="false" bold="true" size="64" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="touchLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="btn_pause" source="btn-pause_png" x="866" y="10"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="m_performanceLabel" text="0" font="num_score" x="809" y="32"/>
		<e:Group id="pauseLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
			<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.29"/>
			<e:Group height="136" width="236" y="147" horizontalCenter="0">
				<e:Image source="bg-common-btn_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				<e:Image id="btn_home" source="btn-common_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				<e:Image source="icon-home_png" x="46" verticalCenter="0.5" touchEnabled="false"/>
				<e:Image source="label-main-menu_png" x="88" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group height="126" width="252" y="280" horizontalCenter="0">
				<e:Image source="bg-common-btn_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				<e:Image id="btn_resume" source="btn-common_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				<e:Image source="icon-resume_png" x="52" verticalCenter="-1.5" touchEnabled="false"/>
				<e:Image source="label-restart_png" x="110" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="m_bgChain" source="bg-chain_png" anchorOffsetX="87" anchorOffsetY="50" x="170" y="301"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="m_numChain" x="113" y="283" font="num_score" text="0"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labelReward" text="标签" x="144" y="287" size="23" textColor="0xFFAF02"/>
		<e:Image id="m_labelChain" source="label-chain_png" x="201" y="299" anchorOffsetX="36.5" anchorOffsetY="19.5"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
	<e:Image source="ws_logo" y="31" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group height="21" width="500" horizontalCenter="0" y="403">
		<e:Image id="loadingBar" source="ws_loading_bar" scale9Grid="11,2,311,17" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Image id="loadings" source="ws_loadings" scale9Grid="7,2,318,17" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" width="500"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="logos" source="ws_logos" y="480" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RankIRSkin" width="505" height="77" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="bg-rank-user_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Label id="nick" text="{data.nick}" x="195" y="18" width="140" size="20" textColor="0xC34200" height="41" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Group height="60" width="60" x="29" y="8.5">
		<e:Image id="bgRank" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="{data.bgRank}"/>
		<e:Label id="rank" text="{data.rank}" size="25" textColor="0x700B0B" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="score" text="{data.score}" x="348" y="28.5" size="20" textColor="0x072FB2"/>
	<e:Group height="64" width="64" x="124" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image horizontalCenter="0.5" source="bg-item-icon_png" width="51" height="53" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="avatar" x="7" y="6" width="50" height="50" source="{data.avatar}"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SlideSkin" width="294" height="63" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg-volume_png" x="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_volume" source="btn-volume_png" x="55" verticalCenter="0" width="82" height="63"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SettingLayerSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.38"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-common1_png" y="178" width="618" height="341" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-common-title_png" y="130" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="label-setting_png" y="141" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_music" source="btn-music_png" y="251" x="278"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_audio" source="btn-audio_png" y="361" x="278"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_close" source="btn-close1_png" x="726" y="162"/>
	<ns1:Slide id="musicSlide" x="397" y="265.5" skinName="SlideSkin"/>
	<ns1:Slide id="audioSilde" y="375.5" skinName="SlideSkin" x="397"/>
	<e:Image id="musicNo" source="btn-no-select_png" x="288" y="261" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image id="audioNo" source="btn-no-select_png" x="288" y="371" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StartSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  >
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg-main_jpg"/>
	<e:Image x="694" y="525" source="bg-common-btn_png"/>
	<e:Image id="btnStart" y="534" x="711" source="btn-common_png"/>
	<e:Image x="733" y="551" touchEnabled="false" source="label-start-game_png"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-coin-bar1_png" x="670" y="30"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-coin-bar1_png" x="670" y="114"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-coin-bar1_png" x="670" y="204"/>
	<e:Image source="icon-fruit_png" x="677.6" y="34.3" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6"/>
	<e:Image source="icon-power_png" x="668" y="205"/>
	<e:Image source="icon-diamond_png" x="676" y="118"/>
	<e:Image source="bg-stage_png" x="671" y="381"/>
	<e:Image id="bmpLights" source="icon-lights_png" x="670" y="318" width="257" height="131"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelFruit" x="731" y="36" font="num_fruit" text="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDiamond" y="120" text="0" font="num_fruit" x="731"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelPower" y="210" text="0" font="num_fruit" x="731"/>
	<e:Group height="584" width="566" x="54" y="30">
		<e:Rect height="424" width="539" fillColor="0x556F29" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Scroller width="505" height="368" x="30" y="104">
			<e:viewport>
				<e:List id="listView" height="360" width="505">
					<e:layout>
						<e:VerticalLayout gap="0"/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:List>
			</e:viewport>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Image id="btn_tab0" source="btn-corner2_png" x="10" y="35"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_tab1" source="btn-center-tab1_png" x="153" y="35"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_tab2" source="btn-corner2_png" y="35" x="556" scaleX="-1"/>
		<e:Image source="bg-corner_png" x="13" y="469"/>
		<e:Image source="bg-corner_png" y="469" x="553" scaleX="-1"/>
		<e:Image source="bg-center_png" x="148" y="469"/>
		<e:Image source="bg-center_png" y="469" x="283"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_help" source="icon-service_png" x="55.5" y="482.5"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_setting" source="icon-setting_png" x="456" y="483"/>
		<e:Image source="label-shop_png" x="43" y="51"/>
		<e:Image source="label-rank_png" x="197" y="52"/>
		<e:Image source="label-strange_png" x="440" y="50"/>
		<e:Image source="loading-rotate_png" x="238" y="235" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="UploadSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect right="0" bottom="0" left="0" top="0" fillAlpha="0.36" x="10" y="10"/>
	<e:Image id="loading" source="ws_upload_loading" verticalCenter="55" anchorOffsetX="55" anchorOffsetY="55" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="mainLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image id="bg" scale9Grid="34,34,409,604" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="0.5" height="341" width="585" source="ws_upload_bg"/>
		<e:Label id="tipLabel" width="498" size="35" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x636364" height="72" verticalAlign="middle" text="网络错误" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="287"/>
		<e:Image id="btnRetry" scale9Grid="28,4,303,52" width="486" y="394" source="ws_upload_btn" height="74" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="labelBtn" text="重   试" y="419" bold="true" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0.5" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Label id="btnClose" text="X" x="717" y="169" textColor="0x66CD33" size="50" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Label id="title" text="加载失败" y="174" textColor="0x66CD33" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="50" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
